Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GraphicController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GraphicController
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class GraphicController extends ViewObservable implements View
Class that control the GUI and implement View. This class represents the GUI (Graphic User Interface).
